Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 29th overall pick, by Syracuse in 1965...
Injured on 8/13/1965 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/22/1966 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/6/1966 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 8/14/1968 with a Bruised Hand, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1971, off Nicky Rix (LYN)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/2/1971, off Carl Severino (PON)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1974...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Lynchburg on 4/24/1979...
Injured on 6/11/1980 with a Bruised Wrist, out for one week...
Injured on 9/17/1981 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Pontiac on 2/3/1984 to a 1-year deal worth $734,400 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 2/13/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
